title: Incapacitated
excerpt: An incapacitated creature can't take any action, Bonus Action, or Reaction, can't speak, and their Concentration is broken.
markdown: # Incapacitated While you have the Incapacitated condition, you experience the following effects: * **Inactive.** You can't take any action, Bonus Action, or Reaction. * **No Concentration.** Your Concentration is broken. * **Speechless.** You can't speak. * **Surprised.** If you're Incapacitated when you roll Initiative, you have Disadvantage on the roll.
